data.title: Animated gif tools
data.description: Easy to use online animated GIF maker and image editor. Create, convert, crop, resize, reverse, optimize animated GIF, WebP, APNG files, images and videos.
data.content:
Ezgif - free online animated GIF editor
===============

[ezGif.com Animated GIFs Made Easy](https://ezgif.com/ "Online animated GIF tools")

*   [GIF Maker](https://ezgif.com/maker "Make animated GIF from still frames or edit frame order and duration of existing GIF")
*   [Video to GIF](https://ezgif.com/video-to-gif "Video to GIF converter")
*   [Resize](https://ezgif.com/resize "Resize animated image")
*   [Rotate](https://ezgif.com/rotate "Rotate / reverse animated GIFs and images")
*   [Crop](https://ezgif.com/crop "Crop selection of image")
*   [Optimize](https://ezgif.com/optimize "Reduce animation size")
*   [Effects](https://ezgif.com/effects "Add effects to images and animations")
*   [Split](https://ezgif.com/split "Split GIF image to frames")
*   [Add text](https://ezgif.com/add-text "Write text over GIF image")
*   [WebP](https://ezgif.com/webp-maker "Animated WebP maker and tools")
*   [APNG](https://ezgif.com/apng-maker "Animated PNG (APNG) maker and tools")
*   [AVIF](https://ezgif.com/avif-maker "AVIF tools")
*   [JXL](https://ezgif.com/jxl-maker "JPEG XL tools")

  

Online GIF maker and image editor
=================================

*   [Video to GIF](https://ezgif.com/video-to-gif "Video to GIF online converter")
*   [Resizer](https://ezgif.com/resize "Resize GIFs and other animated images")
*   [Optimizer](https://ezgif.com/optimize "Optimize animated GIFs for file size and performance")
*   [GIF Maker](https://ezgif.com/maker "Make animated GIF from multiple images")

Ezgif.com is a simple, free online GIF maker and toolset for basic animated image editing.  
Here you can create, edit and convert GIF, APNG, WebP, MNG and AVIF animations.

ezgif.com news and updates
--------------------------

*   Feb 21, 2025Updated the dark mode color scheme.  
    Added more customization options for the [Barcode Generator](https://ezgif.com/barcode-generator) - size, filenames, and output format.
    
*   Feb 15, 2025The [Sprite Sheet Cutter](https://ezgif.com/sprite-cutter) now allows you to customize output filenames, with additional output formats available.
    
*   Feb 7, 2025Added an [image to PDF converter](https://ezgif.com/jpg-to-pdf). It accepts all the same formats as the GIF maker, allowing you to create a PDF document from JPGs, animated files, image archives, and a mix of different formats and sizes.
    
*   Feb 1, 2025Today, I added a few more converters for various file format combinations:  
    [HEIC to WebP](https://ezgif.com/heic-to-webp), [HEIC to GIF](https://ezgif.com/heic-to-gif), [TIFF to WebP](https://ezgif.com/tiff-to-webp), [APNG to JXL](https://ezgif.com/apng-to-jxl), [JXL to AVIF](https://ezgif.com/jxl-to-avif), [JXL to APNG](https://ezgif.com/jxl-to-apng).
    
*   Jan 19, 2025We have added a new [freeze video tool](https://ezgif.com/freeze-video) that allows you to apply a freeze frame effect. This tool lets you pause the video and display a still frame for a specified duration.
    
*   Jan 17, 2025[Video reverser](https://ezgif.com/reverse-video) tool now supports creating a boomerang or ping-pong effect, where the video plays to the end and then reverses back to the start.
    
*   Dec 21, 2024Fixed an issue where APNG files produced by EZGIF were incompatible with some other software and websites.
    
*   Dec 16, 2024The [GIF Combine](https://ezgif.com/combine) tool can now join files not only side by side but also one on top of the other. Added [MP4 to MP3 converter](https://ezgif.com/mp4-to-mp3).
    
*   Dec 11, 2024Added play/pause button (also works with spacebar) to the [crop video](https://ezgif.com/crop-video) tool.  
    New converters: [WebP to SVG](https://ezgif.com/webp-to-svg) and [SVG to WebP](https://ezgif.com/svg-to-webp)  
    Added quality settings to JPG to WebP and PNG to WebP converters.
    
*   Jul 9, 2024Added 16 FPS option to video to GIF/APNG/WebP converters.
    
*   Mar 6, 2024Added [PNG to SVG](https://ezgif.com/png-to-svg) and [JPG to SVG](https://ezgif.com/jpg-to-svg) converters using Autotrace and VTracer tools.
    
*   Feb 23, 2024We have doubled the maximum upload file size! Now you can upload GIFs and other files up to 200MB.
    
    The maximum image resolution in the GIF maker and resizer tools has been increased from 1200x1200px to 1920x1920px to allow for the creation of Full HD (FHD) GIFs.
    
*   Feb 6, 2024Added [WebP to WebM](https://ezgif.com/webp-to-webm) and [APNG to WebM](https://ezgif.com/apng-to-webm) converters.  
    Improved support for animated WebP files with transparent backgrounds.
    
    Support for the FLIF image format has been removed. Development of this format appears to have been abandoned for several years, and it never achieved widespread adoption. Additionally, some of the FLIF tools have been broken for a while, and I don't feel it would be worth the effort to fix them.
    

[1](https://ezgif.com/) [2](https://ezgif.com/archive/2) [3](https://ezgif.com/archive/3) [4](https://ezgif.com/archive/4) [5](https://ezgif.com/archive/5)

*   **Ezgif resources**
*   [Help / FAQ](https://ezgif.com/help)
*   [About and contacts](https://ezgif.com/about)
*   [Privacy and Cookies](https://ezgif.com/privacy)
*   [Search ezgif.com](https://ezgif.com/search)
*   [![Image 1: Buy Me A Coffee (donate)](https://ezgif.com/images/coffee.svg)](https://buymeacoffee.com/ezgif)

*   **Video tools**
*   [GIF to MP4 converter](https://ezgif.com/gif-to-mp4 "Convert animated GIFs to MP4 videos")
*   [Online video cutter](https://ezgif.com/cut-video "Upload and cut a video file")
*   [Video reverser](https://ezgif.com/reverse-video "Reverse a video")
*   [Video crop tool](https://ezgif.com/crop-video "Crop/trim a video")
*   [Video rotator](https://ezgif.com/rotate-video "Rotate a video")
*   [Any video to MP4](https://ezgif.com/video-to-mp4 "Convert video file in any other format to MP4 online")
*   [MP4 to MP3 converter](https://ezgif.com/mp4-to-mp3 "MP4 to MP3 (video to audio) converter")

*   **Popular file converters**
*   [JPG to PDF converter](https://ezgif.com/jpg-to-pdf "Convert JPG images to PDF document")
*   [WebP to JPG converter](https://ezgif.com/webp-to-jpg "Convert WebP images to JPG")
*   [WebP to PNG converter](https://ezgif.com/webp-to-png "Convert WebP images to PNG / APNG")
*   [HEIC to JPG converter](https://ezgif.com/heic-to-jpg "Convert HEIC images to JPG")
*   [AVIF to JPG converter](https://ezgif.com/avif-to-jpg "Online AVIF to JPG converter")
*   [PNG to JPG converter](https://ezgif.com/png-to-jpg "Online PNG to JPG converter")
*   [SVG to PNG converter](https://ezgif.com/svg-to-png "Online SVG to PNG converter")

*   **Other image tools**
*   [Image to Data URI](https://ezgif.com/image-to-datauri "Convert image files to DataURI code")
*   [MNG tools](https://ezgif.com/mng-maker "Animated MNG maker")
*   [QR and barcode generators](https://ezgif.com/qr-generator "Generate QR or barcode images")
*   [Crop PDF](https://ezgif.com/crop-pdf "Crop PDF documents")
*   [Metadata viewer](https://ezgif.com/view-metadata "View image metadata (exif)")
*   [SVG tools](https://ezgif.com/png-to-svg "Convert (vectorize) PNG images to SVG format")
*   [All ezgif.com converters](https://ezgif.com/converters "All file format converters")
